trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Espone i tipi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" /> all'automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> representing the bounding rectangle of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> che rappresenta il rettangolo di delimitazione dell’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that contains the coordinates of the element, or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> if the element is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> and a <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> che contiene le coordinate dell'elemento o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" /> se l'elemento non è un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> e un <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di elementi figlio dell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer> provides access to its content through <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>, this method always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Poiché <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer> fornisce l'accesso al contenuto tramite <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>, questo metodo restituisce sempre `null`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that represents the clickable space that is on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> che rappresenta lo spazio selezionabile in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> on the element that allows a click.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> nell'elemento che consente la selezione.

trans-unit.source: The point values are (<see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />) if the element is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> and a <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />.
trans-unit.target: I valori del punto sono (<see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />) se l'elemento non è un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> e un <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer" /> is off of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextElementAutomationPeer" /> è fuori dallo schermo.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l’elemento non è sullo schermo; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà indica se l'elemento è visibile.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, the element can be on the screen but still not be visible.
trans-unit.target: In alcuni casi, l'elemento può essere sullo schermo ma non essere ancora visibile.

trans-unit.source: An example is an element that is obscured by other elements.
trans-unit.target: Un esempio è un elemento è nascosto da altri elementi.
